org.araneaframework.backend.list.helper
Class JPAListSqlHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.backend.list.helper.BaseListSqlHelper
      org.araneaframework.backend.list.helper.ListSqlHelper
          org.araneaframework.backend.list.helper.JPAListSqlHelper

public class JPAListSqlHelper
extends ListSqlHelper

A list helper that makes use of JPA methods to fetch list items.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)

Method Detail

setBeginFromSelect

public void setBeginFromSelect(boolean beginFromSelect)
Specifies whether the composed query must begin with "SELECT" or with "FROM". By default begins with "FROM". Set beginFromSelect to true to make the query begin with "SELECT";

Parameters:
beginFromSelect - A Boolean indicating whether the composed query must begin with "SELECT".

createItemRangeQuery

protected String createItemRangeQuery(String fromSql,
                                      String customWhereSql,
                                      String customOrderbySql)
Override to generate custom JPA query.

Overrides:
createItemRangeQuery in class BaseListSqlHelper
Parameters:
fromSql - The part of query that follows the " FROM " in the query. Never empty nor null.
customWhereSql - The part of query that follows the " WHERE " in the query. Null when customWhereArgs is null.
Returns:
The complete query string to use for querying the number of all matching rows.

execute

public <T> T execute(ConnectionCallback<T> action)
An override to customize executing queries more suitable for JPA queries.

Overrides:
execute in class BaseListSqlHelper
Parameters:
action - callback object that specifies the action.
Returns:
a result object returned by the action, or null.

createQuery

protected static javax.persistence.Query createQuery(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                     SqlStatement statement)
Helper method that creates a JPA query (using given statement) and sets the query parameters (using the given statement).

Parameters:
entityManager - The entity manager to use for creating the JPA query.
statement - The query data.
Returns:
The created but not executed JPA query.

createQuery

protected static javax.persistence.Query createQuery(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                     String queryStr,
                                                     List<Object> params)
Helper method that creates a JPA query (using given query string) and sets the query parameters (using the given query parameters).

Parameters:
entityManager - The entity manager to use for creating the JPA query.
queryStr - The JPA query string to use in the query.
params - The JPA query parameters to use in the query.
Returns:
The created but not executed JPA query.
